lead_paragraph: Defenseman Niklas Kronwall will miss the final game of Detroit’s playoff series against Tampa Bay for charging Lightning forward Nikita Kucherov.

headline.main: Red Wings’ Kronwall Is Suspended for Game 7

snippet: Defenseman Niklas Kronwall will miss the final game of Detroit’s playoff series against Tampa Bay for charging Lightning forward Nikita Kucherov.
abstract: NHL suspends Detroit Red Wings defenseman Niklas Kronwall for Game 7 of playoff series against Tampa Bay for charging.
